name: Stock Game
description:
[Tactic Series] Tactical game, with realistic stock market simulation

The first game of the tactic series, please do look forward to the next game of the series! Make sure to look out for new games in the Tactic Series!

Typical MONEY WARS! A realistic simulator of stock market. With special financial events, like financial crises, financial tsunamis and many more! Monitor the virtual stock market and don't miss the chance to invest or withdraw. Every event is controlled by a set of algorithm generated by a self-learning AIs using real stock market price as training data.

Comes along with two gamemodes: Casual mode and real-time mode! Casual mode allows you to play a quick game while real-time mode allows you to play a game that lasts for all day long and with special financial events.

Please report bugs and glitches or give ideas to me at ccheukka@gmail.com!

Click here to check out the timelapse of me programming this game!

****This is a re-creation of Stock Game 2(by s0921040 (also known as tobylam092) ), please do check out his original game! How to play:

Monitor the trend and make sensible decisions. You can choose whether to buy or sell stock, do long-term investments or short-term investments. You can even make loan from banks or set up time deposit accounts. The game rule is simple: You go bankrupt, you lose the game. Compete high score with your friends!
